title: ANI, न्यूज 18 की भ्रामक खबर: केक काटकर बकरीद मनाते RSS से संबद्ध मुस्लिम संगठन को बताया “लखनऊ के लोग”
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: People in #Lucknow are preparing to celebrate an eco-friendly #Bakrid by cutting cakes with a goat image. A buyer at a bakery says, “The custom of sacrificing an animal on Bakrid is not right. I appeal to everyone to celebrate the festival by cutting a cake instead of an animal.” pic.twitter.com/C5EJ73dKM1
